entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
